details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.4 Colour Spaces - 6.2.4.3 Uncalibrated/Device colour spaces - DeviceCMYK
details.description: DeviceCMYK shall only be used if a device independent DefaultCMYK colour space has been set when the DeviceCMYK colour space is used or if the current transparency blending space, when the DeviceCMYK colour space is used, is a device independent CMYK-based colour space or the current PDF/A OutputIntent, when the DeviceCMYK colour space is used, contains a 'CMYK' destination profile.
